body: Repeating Islands blogs about the commemoration of the 158th birthday of national hero José Martí, while Iván's File Cabinet says: "The government likes to sell the image of a sad guy, committed to the independence of his homeland...Martí was much more."
original_body: Repeating Islands blogs about the commemoration of the 158th birthday of national hero José Martí, while Iván's File Cabinet says: "The government likes to sell the image of a sad guy, committed to the independence of his homeland...Martí was much more."
title: Cuba: Uncovering Martí
